snippet.title: Slayer's Testaments - mod beta for QUAKE
snippet.description:
Install (unzip) it in this order. Works best with Quakespasm!

Slayer's Testaments 2nd Release:
MOD (latest) https://drive.google.com/file/d/1Hn3ll5P2A8Gh3oQyHeGQRkYratqHouQq/view?usp=sharing
(unzip into Quake directory)

Music FIles:
MUSIC: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1asVqR7Ug9LG9b6Na1LYm_FAJT16VYXXm/view
(unzip into Quake/Slayertest/music)

"Eternal Path of Destruction" - classic map pack, latest 7-level version:
UPDATED MAPSET: http://www.mediafire.com/file/ohtgqjncbs21q5j/EPOD.zip/file
(unzip into Quake/Slayertest)

Snapmap may not be a proper mapping / modding tool, but Slayer's Testaments sure will be! This mod by Bloodshot12 will allow mappers and modders to truly be able to map for Doom 2016 and Eternal! We just wanna be sure we don't step on any legal toes b4 releasing this mod (look at Doom 4 remake!)

This map in question here is based off of my 'rerouting' level I made for YPOD. I ditched the 'Quake 3 for Quake format' of that level and went straight with Quake 1 valve goodness. Much better!

I die by Baron, so you guys don't get to see the 'spoiler' end boss. It was for the best, tho!

The original 'YPOD' version:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ruT7xmCt6zw&t=14s
